nodes.text: Fotakex was a commentator on Gundark's Gear Datalog during the early years of the New Republic. Fotakex added comments to the E-11 blaster rifle entry in the Datalog, detailing some of its history and how BlasTech eventually discontinued the line. Fotakex also commented on the Espo grenade mortar, PLX-4 Missile Launcher, and Apex Incisor Missile entries.
